description: - Leather case cover can be transformed into a horizontal stand for the convenience of viewing slide shows or videos at 2 different angles- Unique design allows easy access to all buttons, controls & ports without having to remove the case- Rotates 360 degrees in the case for flexible landscape and portrait viewing.-Specifications-- For Galaxy Note N8000- Material: PU Leather- Colour: Pink-- Note: Galaxy Note N8000 is not included in the package
title: GMYLE Pink PU Leather 360 Degree Rotating Swivel Folio Case Cover With Adjustable Multi Angle Stand For Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 N8000 Tablet
